Title: Requires employees of gaming facilities to undergo human-trafficking recognition training
Summary: Requires employees of gaming facilities to undergo human-trafficking recognition training which shall address the nature of human trafficking, how human trafficking is defined in law, how to identify victims of human trafficking, relief and recovery options for survivors, and social and legal services available to victims.
LawCode: Add ยง210, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to employee human trafficking recognition training in gaming facilities
